alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 8:29PM EDT until June 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .Increased northeast winds and high astronomical tides have caused the St Johns River at Astor to reach Minor Flood Stage. River levels are forecast to hover around or potentially just above Minor Flood Stage through much of Tuesday, before falling back to Action Stage by Wednesday. For the St. Johns River...including Astor...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon by 1200 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Astor. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 2.3 feet, Minor flooding of low lying streets and yards north of Fox Road on Lake County side of Astor, and from River Road northward on Volusia side of river. Water begins to cover docks at South Moon Fish Camp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 2.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM EDT Monday was 2.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 1.6 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat St Johns River Astor 2.3 2.3 Mon 7 pm 2.2 2.1 1.8 1.6 1.6 &&
